description: Change of use of part of vehicular repair and servicing (B2 Use Class) to a restaurant (A3 Use Class), external alterations to front elevation.
decision_conditions: The proposed change of use in residential area would be considered detrimental to the amenity of nearby residential uses as a result of the arrival and departure of customers during the hours of operations (particularly night time), noise and disturbance associated with the proposed A3 restaurant use.  As such the proposal is contrary to Section 8 of the National Planning Policy Guidance 2012, Policies 7.1, 7.4, 7.15 of the London Plan 2015, Policy 1.1(g)(j), 2.10 of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012), and Policy 7A of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013). | The proposed change of use in residential area would be considered detrimental to Highways as a result of the arrival and departure of customers during operating hours and lack of on-site parking and servicing provision. As such the proposal is contrary to Section 4 of the National Planning Policy Guidance 2012, Policy 6.13 of the London Plan 2015, Policy 1.1(f) and Ealing Local Variation to London Plan Policy 6.13.
